578480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Cyberpunk 1 (Token Pack)
578480.description:
Created by Colin Richardson, this token module contains 120 tokens for the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. There are 7 unique characters and 2 drones. Each character comes with 16 colors for their hair and clothes (112), plus each drone comes in 4 colors (8 total).
These tokens are based on 128x128 pixels allowing you to use them for PCs or NPC's throughout your games. Once you buy this token pack, when you activate the module the tokens will appear in your Token box.
Set 1 includes:
  • Drone #1 (large insect)
  • Drone #2 (roto drone)
  • Female Dwarf Hacker
  • Female Elf Mage
  • Male Dwarf Shaman
  • Male Elf Mage
  • Male Human Rigger
  • Male Human Soldier
  • Male Ork Bodyguard
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software. It will work with any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
